song.englishname: It Is Well With My Soul- Chris Rice

english.segment1: When peace, like a river, attendeth my way, When sorrows like sea billows roll;. Whatever my lot, Thou has taught me to say, It is well, it is well, with my soul.
english.segment2: It is well, with my soul, It is well, with my soul, It is well, it is well, with my soul.
english.segment3: Though Satan should buffet, though trials should come, Let this blessed assurance control, That Christ has regarded my helpless estate, And hath shed His own blood for my soul.
english.segment4: It is well, with my soul, It is well, with my soul, It is well, it is well, with my soul.
english.segment5: My sin, oh, the bliss of this glorious thought!. My sin, not in part but the whole, Is nailed to the cross, and I bear it no more, Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, O my soul!
english.segment6: It is well, with my soul, It is well, with my soul, It is well, it is well, with my soul.
english.segment7: And Lord, haste the day when my faith shall be sight, The clouds be rolled back as a scroll;. The trump shall resound, and the Lord shall descend, Even so, it is well with my soul.
english.segment8: It is well, with my soul, It is well, with my soul, It is well, it is well, with my soul.
